    Details

  8. éº»è¾£
    Details

day 16

  1. AAåˆ¶ (AA zhÃ¬)
    Details
    • pinyin: AA zhÃ¬
    • definition: to go dutch; to split the bill (literally "algebraic average system")
    • usage: a system where each person pays for their own share of a bill, especially for a meal.
    • example: æˆ‘ä»¬ä»Šå¤©AAåˆ¶å§ã€‚(wÇ’men jÄ«ntiÄn AA zhÃ¬ ba.) - let's go dutch today.

    • definition: chef; cook

    • example: è¿™å®¶é¤å…çš„å¨å¸ˆæ‰‹è‰ºå¾ˆå¥½ã€‚(zhÃ¨ jiÄ cÄntÄ«ng de chÃºshÄ« shÇ’uyÃ¬ hÄ›n hÇo.) - the chef at this restaurant is very skilled.
    • contexts: restaurants, cooking, professions.
